title: [Self-directed] Social Curriculum Improvement Project through Participatory Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies content knowledge and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: University students/job seekers with secondary education experience analyze current curriculum issues and propose improvements through participatory design activities in a project-based setting.

learning_goals: Students can provide three or more specific feedback sessions on curriculum design through participatory design workshops
Learners can develop and implement one or more unit improvement plans for social studies using PBL approaches in team-based settings
Participating students can improve perception scores regarding instructional design by 20% or more through pre-post surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
